Suukie frowns......he was still staring at the pipe that Megatron escaped
through..........he turned and looked at Dinobot...... "and the rest..is
silent......i have become...way too violent....." he said sadly......he
pulled back his sword right in front of whatever Maximals are in the base
and stabbed himself with it...he falls........a puddle of blood filling the
whole room.........
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 02, 2000 3:58 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::: Within the network of airvents, the critically damaged MEGATRON
scurries
> along. He could see the exit vent into the bridge where the Auto-bots lay
> motionless....now he had to get inside. Glaring into the room, he saw
Optimus
> sitting within the command chair. That was his first target. MEGATRON put
out
> his left hand to push the vent face away....and suddenly a burst of energy
> shot through him, leaving his left arm dead. ::::
>
> ::: MEGATRON ::: Damn alarm!
>
> ::: He looked around to see a small control panel. with his gun, he
blasted
> it off the wall and crept inside. :::
>
> ::: Cautiously he made his way between the giant bots, the the feet of
> Optimus Prime :::
>
> ::: MEGATRON ::: Now, my dear enermy, you will die!
>
> ::: BLACK ARACNIA, GREMLIN, and JACKLE burst inside :::
>
> ::: BLACK ARACNIA shoots the gun out of MEGATRONs hand ::: Hold it lizard
> breath, were not letting you alter time....
>
> ::: MEGATRON ::: Argh! No, not this time!
>
> ::: GREMLIN and JACKLE begin to fire on MEGATRON :::
>
> ::: MEGATRON turns and takes cover in the shadows....secretly he sends a
> transmission to his team to get into he arc and help him :::
>
